Yuumi: Its free real estate

She's shit when she's not attached. Only reason to be unattached is to bait skillshots in lane then w your ally to avoid it/ also to proc passive or to ward mid to late game. It should be like a 70/30 attached to unattached ratio.

Edit: unless you mean emotionally attached. In which case, yeah, to many nutjobs are emotionally attached to winning and will cry if anything doesn't go there way.
or ditch your adc and attach to the best player on ur team and proceed to suck their **** for the rest of the game, hopefully u can help them carry ur team

I'm sorry what?

Her q relies on being attached to do anything and its still beyond mediocre and if she attaches to a melee it is useless while in melee range because its going to instantly hit and not become empowered which is the only way for it to do again, mediocre damage but also only way for her to apply its slow also without being attached it is just a pretty slow skillshot, and again still needs 1 second of flight time to do anything decent which the damage is still reduced because she's not receiving bonus ap from her W passive.

Her passive relies on her being not attached to use it (just pop out when its up to regain mana) but she's legit the squishiest champion in game and has no reliable cc even as a 100% support champ.

 Her W passive is probably the best thing about her kit, and relies on her being attached to make her and her partner do scaling damage. 

Her E's healing relies on their health being low to do anything decent and only heals her attached person or herself if she's not attached, which again because she's not attached reduces the healing because shes not getting her W passive, the speed boost is nice tho. Also it only has 10% ap scaling, which is garbage and its still pretty much going to be less than Sona's healing which heals 2 people and shields them while Yuumi's only heals herself or attached.

Her Ulti is the only thing I don't really have problems with outside of her W, but again this is just about you claiming its best not to be attached whole game, which severely neuters her, pun intended.

Wanna get better with Yuumi? Play Sona, the better Yuumi, until they fix her outright, or you have a laning partner you can rely on. The only game I played her I went 6/6/18 over 32 minutes, only did 15k damage 3rd to bottom and only because both top laners were feeding hard so they were below me in damage.

Here's the real way to get better with Yuumi: Wait 1-2 years for adcs and junglers to learn how to assist her. Adcs right now will literally pull you away from even hitting Q's. Junglers will see you walking toward them, and will keep going! Craploads of wasted time/skills which really are not within your power to control.

And then the adc will post a whopping 8k damage per game while Yuumi posts 11k.

Only time to detach is:
1. Early game where your auto attacks matter
2. to proc your passive
3. to body block skill shots that would have otherwise killed the one you attached to.

Exactly!

You should be attached only about 90% of the time…
